    WCT Hartanah Sdn Bhd Job Vacancies 2021 - Assistant Security Supervisor

    January 3, 2021

    TOC

    • Vacancy
    • How To Apply

    WCT Hartanah Sdn Bhd job vacancies 2021 for Assistant Security Supervisor position which based in Skudai. Jawatan kosong WCT Hartanah Sdn Bhd 2021 terkini untuk kekosongan Assistant Security Supervisor penempatan di Skudai.

    Vacancy

    • Assistant Security Supervisor

    RESPONSIBILITIES:

    • To enforce discipline and good work ethics of the outsourced guards, including monitoring of attendance.
    • To anticipate any preventive and pro-active actions that needs to be taken to prevent crime in and around the mall.
    • Supervises that all daily routines, assignments and shifts are carried out as scheduled, including roll call and briefings for the guards.
    • To investigate and report all incidents of crime and safety that occurs the mall.
    • To observe and coordinate all vendor and contractor activity at site for compliance to company policies/procedures.
    • To implement and assist enforcement agencies in compliance to all relevant Laws, Government Regulations and Acts.
    • To carry out scheduled training of outsourced guards to increase competency level and build confidence in handling situations/incidents.
    • Be familiar with all Emergency Response Procedures and enforce them as and when necessary.

    REQUIREMENTS:

    • Candidate must possess at least SPM.
    • At least 2 years' working experience in similar capacity in shopping mall, hotel or commercial buildings.
    • Good written and verbal communication skills – English and Bahasa Malaysia.
    • Computer literate
    • Good leadership with high sense of integrity.
    • Good problem solving/ investigation skills.
    • Non-executives specializing in Security/ Armed Forces/ Protective Services are encouraged to apply.
    • Able to work shifts, weekends and public holidays.
    • Position is based in SKUDAI,JOHOR BAHRU.

    Job Type: Full-time

    职位类型:全职

    远程办公:

    • 否

    How To Apply

    Are you looking for new challenge and job opportunity in hotel industry this 2021 ? Just apply this Assistant Security Supervisor job online through Linkedin Apply Online
